fields.name: CHROM
fields.label: CHROM
fields.description: Chromosome identifier

fields.name: POS
fields.label: POS
fields.description: The reference position

fields.name: ID
fields.label: ID
fields.description: Semi-colon separated list of unique identifiers where available

fields.name: REF
fields.label: REF
fields.description: The value in the POS field refers to the position of the first base in the String

fields.name: ALT
fields.label: ALT
fields.description: Comma separated list of alternate non-reference alleles called on at least one of the samples

fields.name: QUAL
fields.label: QUAL
fields.description: Quality

fields.name: FILTER
fields.label: FILTER
fields.description: Filter status

fields.name: INFO_NS
fields.label: INFO_NS
fields.description: Number of samples with data

fields.name: INFO_HS
fields.label: INFO_HS
fields.description: Indicate it is at a hot spot

fields.name: INFO_DP
fields.label: INFO_DP
fields.description: Total read depth at the locus

fields.name: INFO_RO
fields.label: INFO_RO
fields.description: Reference allele observations

fields.name: INFO_AO
fields.label: INFO_AO
fields.description: Alternate allele observations

fields.name: INFO_SRF
fields.label: INFO_SRF
fields.description: Number of reference observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_SRR
fields.label: INFO_SRR
fields.description: Number of reference observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_SAF
fields.label: INFO_SAF
fields.description: Alternate allele observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_SAR
fields.label: INFO_SAR
fields.description: Alternate allele observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_FDP
fields.label: INFO_FDP
fields.description: Flow Evaluator read depth at the locus

fields.name: INFO_FRO
fields.label: INFO_FRO
fields.description: Flow Evaluator Reference allele observations

fields.name: INFO_FAO
fields.label: INFO_FAO
fields.description: Flow Evaluator Alternate allele observations

fields.name: INFO_AF
fields.label: INFO_AF
fields.description: Allele frequency based on Flow Evaluator observation counts

fields.name: INFO_QD
fields.label: INFO_QD
fields.description: QualityByDepth as 4*QUAL/FDP (analogous to GATK)

fields.name: INFO_FSRF
fields.label: INFO_FSRF
fields.description: Flow Evaluator Reference observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_FSRR
fields.label: INFO_FSRR
fields.description: Flow Evaluator Reference observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_FSAF
fields.label: INFO_FSAF
fields.description: Flow Evaluator Alternate allele observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_FSAR
fields.label: INFO_FSAR
fields.description: Flow Evaluator Alternate allele observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_FXX
fields.label: INFO_FXX
fields.description: Flow Evaluator failed read ratio

fields.name: INFO_TYPE
fields.label: INFO_TYPE
fields.description: The type of allele, either snp, mnp, ins, del, or complex.

fields.name: INFO_LEN
fields.label: INFO_LEN
fields.description: allele length

fields.name: INFO_HRUN
fields.label: INFO_HRUN
fields.description: Run length: the number of consecutive repeats of the alternate allele in the reference genome

fields.name: INFO_FR
fields.label: INFO_FR
fields.description: Reason why the variant was filtered.

fields.name: INFO_RBI
fields.label: INFO_RBI
fields.description: Distance of bias parameters from zero.

fields.name: INFO_FWDB
fields.label: INFO_FWDB
fields.description: Forward strand bias in prediction.

fields.name: INFO_REVB
fields.label: INFO_REVB
fields.description: Reverse strand bias in prediction.

fields.name: INFO_REFB
fields.label: INFO_REFB
fields.description: Reference Hypothesis bias in prediction.

fields.name: INFO_VARB
fields.label: INFO_VARB
fields.description: Variant Hypothesis bias in prediction.

fields.name: INFO_SSSB
fields.label: INFO_SSSB
fields.description: Strand-specific strand bias for allele.

fields.name: INFO_SSEN
fields.label: INFO_SSEN
fields.description: Strand-specific-error prediction on negative strand.

fields.name: INFO_SSEP
fields.label: INFO_SSEP
fields.description: Strand-specific-error prediction on positive strand.

fields.name: INFO_STB
fields.label: INFO_STB
fields.description: Strand bias in variant relative to reference.

fields.name: INFO_STBP
fields.label: INFO_STBP
fields.description: Pval of Strand bias in variant relative to reference.

fields.name: INFO_PB
fields.label: INFO_PB
fields.description: Bias of relative variant position in reference reads versus variant reads. Equals Mann-Whitney U rho statistic P(Y>X)+0.5P(Y=X)

fields.name: INFO_PBP
fields.label: INFO_PBP
fields.description: Pval of relative variant position in reference reads versus variant reads.  Related to GATK ReadPosRankSumTest

fields.name: INFO_MLLD
fields.label: INFO_MLLD
fields.description: Mean log-likelihood delta per read.

fields.name: INFO_OID
fields.label: INFO_OID
fields.description: List of original Hotspot IDs

fields.name: INFO_OPOS
fields.label: INFO_OPOS
fields.description: List of original allele positions

fields.name: INFO_OREF
fields.label: INFO_OREF
fields.description: List of original reference bases

fields.name: INFO_OALT
fields.label: INFO_OALT
fields.description: List of original variant bases

fields.name: INFO_OMAPALT
fields.label: INFO_OMAPALT
fields.description: Maps OID,OPOS,OREF,OALT entries to specific ALT alleles
